Name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail (1934 recipe)
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Gin Sour with subtle raspberry fruitiness.
History: Adapted from the Cosmopolitan Cocktail recipe in the 1934 Pioneers of Mixing at Elite Bars .
Nutrition: One serving of Cosmopolitan Cocktail (1934 recipe) contains 170 calories
